title: Any close match to some Poynter fonts
content:
Could some experts please help me to identify some (more) affordable fonts that look very much like:

FB Poynter Gothic OS Display Bold Italic  
FB Poynter Old Style Text Two L Roman

and also these ones:  
Poynter Gothic OS Display Roman  
Poynter Old Style Text Two L Italic

Poynter Gothic Text Black Condensed  
Poynter Gothic Text Reg Condensed

Many thanks in advance.
author: pasodeti

comments.content:
It is for a individual freelance project, not for a full newspaper redaction.  
I would like to find a reasonable alternative if available.  
Any reasonable fee (price) from 10 to 40 US$ each,
